Posts.Content: Jun 29, 2009 03:29AM lumineaux wrote: Compared to my hysterectomy, my right side mastectomy with axillary node dissection (done 6/24) hurts *a lot* less.  I'm much more mobile.  However, the lack of pain tempted me to do a bit too much my first day at home and I paid for it in exhaustion today.  You need just as much rest and recovery time as you did for the hysterectomy, even though it doesn't hurt nearly as much.
Posts.Title: Exhaustion Kaidog lumineaux
